notes: Documents: driver’s license or some other picture ID; an insurance card and necessary hospital paperwork; a birth plan – if you have one. See if your hospital will allow you to pre-register – another timesaver.
Things to wear: a bathrobe; a nightgown or two; slippers; socks.
Something for relaxation: good music, along with something you can play it on; a picture of a loved one(s); any other item that reassures and relaxes you.
Cell phone: remember your cell phone along with its charger, or get a prepaid phone card.
